items.sentence: Tom would certainly be surprised if he saw you doing that.
It's too loud in here. Let's go outside where we can talk.
Tom has been saying bad things about you behind your back.
Tom's parents got divorced when he was thirteen years old.
Sea otters are able to use stones to break open shellfish.
Spider bites are much less dangerous than scorpion stings.
I hope that Tom can managed to stay out of jail this time.
Do you know how to start a fire using just sticks of wood?
All those who take up the sword shall perish by the sword.
The police seized a large quantity of drugs at the school.
